sn4.17:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn4.17:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava channam phassayatananam upadaya bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti.
sn4.17:1.3: Te ca bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
sn4.17:2.2: “ayam kho samano gotamo channam phassayatananam upadaya bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sappahamseti.
sn4.17:2.3: Te ca bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
sn4.17:2.4: Yannunaham yena samano gotamo tenupasankameyyam vicakkhukammaya”ti.
sn4.17:2.5: Atha kho maro papima yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavato avidure mahantam bhayabheravam saddamakasi, apissudam pathavi manne undriyati. Atha kho annataro bhikkhu annataram bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn4.17:2.7: Evam vutte, bhagava tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn4.17:2.9: Maro eso papima tumhakam vicakkhukammaya agato”ti.
sn4.17:2.10: Atha kho bhagava “maro ayam papima” iti viditva maram papimantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
